name: Teamfight Manager
summary: Teamfight Manager is a simulation game where you are the coach of an e-sports team. You must manage players to set them up for matches. Make the best of pick & ban by evaluating the characteristics of the champions/players! A smart strategy can make up for a lack of individual player skills.
info:
• 中文名: 团战经理
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2021年3月1日
